com.maxleap

Class MLGameAnalytics

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.maxleap.MLGameAnalytics

  • public class MLGameAnalytics
extends Object
    The MLGameAnalytics class provides an interface to MaxLeap's game logging and analytics backend. Methods will return immediately and cache requests. That is, the request will be sent immediately if possible or the next time a network connection is available otherwise.
